verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Thanks, oh thanks to Him
I need never ever sin,
Jesus, by one sacrifice, for me
Forever paid the price
And now I have the sinless Christ within;
And thanks to Him I need never ever sin.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Sin took charge when Adam fell,
Rewarding men with death and hell,
For sin and death upon all men had passed.
Then into the world came God's own Son,
He fought with sin and Jesus won,
And now men may be free from sin at last.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus claimed He wasn't good,
He strove against sin unto blood,
And as a man He showed what man could do.
Now He has a name above all names,
And gives us power to do the same,
The overcoming power of Christ in you.
